details.detail: Creating and modernizing infrastructure-as-code workflows to improve developer efficiency and operational safety.
Architecting the infrastructure layout of a next-gen data pipeline backed by Databricks and MongoDB Atlas.
Supporting the AWS implementation of two major platforms:
subdetails: A multi-account, event-driven architecture platform, against which applications can be easily developed to access both global and application-specific events.
A bid engine system utilizing a unified GraphQL API and multiple serverless AWS services, such as Lambda and DynamoDB.

details.detail: Designed and developed multiple enterprise-scale content management solutions in AWS for customers in diverse sectors such as government, finance, and healthcare.
Created team- and department-wide automation workflows utilizing GitHub Actions:
subdetails: A standardized Terraform repo setup that initializes CI/CD, secrets, and repository settings.
A Git-driven workflow for building and releasing AMIs using Packer and HCP, including a custom Packer plugin written in Go and centralized package repository.

details.detail: Rearchitected the IaC for an Enterprise Imaging solution, used to host and manage multiple petabytes of healthcare imaging and other data.
Aided in the configuration and use of DevOps tools such as Dynatrace, Octopus Deploy, and Ansible Tower.
Recommended and set up a modern shared storage solution for simultaneous editing of 4K footage.

subdetails: A site to host a short-lived, livestreamed show and convert viewers to donors, deployed with Docker.
Overhauled the site for a subsidiary station including a redesigned donation portal.

details.detail: Built and maintained physical (colocation) and virtual servers for consumer and enterprise clients.
Responded to support tickets for various issues relating to customer solutions.
